name: Shell-Bot
description: Telegram bot for executing shell commands

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get your bot token by talking to @Botfather

RCLONE_CONFIG_BASE64.description: Your Rclone config encoded using Base64

CREDENTIALS_LINK.description: Send credentials.json to @directfilelinkbot and enter link here

TOKEN_PICKLE_LINK.description: Send your token.pickle to @directfilelinkbot and enter link here

ACCOUNTS_FOLDER_LINK.description: Send your accounts.zip to @directfilelinkbot and enter link here
